00093 inline bool listp(Cell* const c)
00094 {
00095   return nullp(c) || c->is_cons();

00147 inline bool nonzerop(Cell* const c)
00148 {
00149   try {
00150     assert_cellnotnull("Given c was null", c);
00151   } catch (runtime_error& e) {
00152     throw_error(e.what(), "cons.hpp::nonzerop(Cell*)");
00153   }
00154 
00155   return c->is_nonzerovalue();

00255 inline Operation get_operation(string const opr)
00256 {
00257   if (opr == "+") {
00258     return add_opr;
00259   } else if (opr == "if") {
00260     return if_opr;
00261   } else if (opr == "ceiling") {
00262     return ceil_opr;
00263   } else if (opr == "-") {
00264     return minus_opr;
00265   } else if (opr == "*") {
00266     return multiply_opr;
00267   } else if (opr == "/") {
00268     return divide_opr;
00269   } else if (opr == "floor") {
00270     return floor_opr;
00271   } else if (opr == "quote") {
00272     return quote_opr;
00273   } else if (opr == "cons") {
00274     return cons_opr;
00275   } else if (opr == "car") {
00276     return car_opr;
00277   } else if (opr == "cdr") {
00278     return cdr_opr;
00279   } else if (opr == "nullp") {
00280     return nullp_opr;
00281   } else if (opr == "define") {
00282     return define_opr;
00283   } else if (opr == "<") {
00284     return lessthan_opr;
00285   } else if (opr == "not") {
00286     return not_opr;
00287   } else if (opr == "print") {
00288     return print_opr;
00289   } else if (opr == "eval") {
00290     return eval_opr;
00291   } else if (opr == "lambda") {
00292     return lambda_opr;
00293   } else if (opr == "apply") {
00294     return apply_opr;
00295   } else if (opr == "let") {
00296     return let_opr;
00297   } else if (opr == "intp") {
00298     return intp_opr;
00299   } else if (opr == "doublep") {
00300     return doublep_opr;
00301   } else if (opr == "symbolp") {
00302     return symbolp_opr;
00303   } else if (opr == "listp") {
00304     return listp_opr;
00305   } else {
00306     return undefined_opr;
00307   }
00308 }

00356 inline int list_size(Cell* const c)
00357 {
00358   int size = 0;
00359   Cell* curr = c;
00360 
00361   while(!nullp(curr)) {
00362     ++size;
00363     if (!listp(curr)) {
00364       return size;
00365     } else {
00366       curr = cdr(curr);
00367     }
00368   }
00369 
00370   return size;
00371 }
00372 
00378 inline Cell* clone_cell(Cell* const c)
00379 {
00380   if (nullp(c)) {
00381     return nil;
00382   }
00383   return c->clone();
00384 }

00400 
00406 inline Cell* cell_apply(Cell* const c, Cell* const args)
00407 {
00408   Cell* procedure = nil;
00409   try {
00410     assert_cellnotnull("Cannot apply null", c);
00411     
00412     // Extra evaluation to ensure c was not a symbol referring to the function.
00413     // Simple eval() of a procedure only returns a copy.
00414     procedure = c;
00415   } catch (runtime_error& e) {
00416     throw_error(e.what(), "cons.hpp::cell_apply(Cell*)");
00417   }
00418 
00419   return procedure->apply(args);
00420 }
